}} 'Strong Hall' is an administrative hall at the University of Kansas in
Lawrence, Kansas, United States. The hall is on the National Register of
Historic Places.
categories: Buildings and structures in Lawrence, Kansas
School buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Kansas
